SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox

Interface MessageDescriptor

All Known Subinterfaces:
IMAPMessageDescriptor
All Known Implementing Classes:
MaildirMessageDescriptor, MboxMessageDescriptor, SimpleMessageDescriptor
public interface MessageDescriptor
Interface describing a message in a mailbox. Contains metadata about a message without loading the entire content.

This is the base interface for message metadata. Protocol-specific extensions may provide additional metadata:

  • POP3 uses the basic interface as-is
  • IMAP extends this with flags, internal date, envelope, etc.
Author:
Chris Burdess
See Also:
  • SimpleMessageDescriptor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getMessageNumber()
    Returns the message sequence number in the mailbox (1-based).
    long
    getSize()
    Returns the message size in octets (RFC 822 format).
    String
    getUniqueId()
    Returns the unique identifier for this message.

  • Method Details

    • getMessageNumber

      int getMessageNumber()
      Returns the message sequence number in the mailbox (1-based). This number may change as messages are expunged.
      Returns:
      the message sequence number

    • getSize

      long getSize()
      Returns the message size in octets (RFC 822 format).
      Returns:
      the size in octets

    • getUniqueId

      String getUniqueId()
      Returns the unique identifier for this message. This identifier must be persistent across sessions and must not change even if message sequence numbers change.

      For POP3, this is used by the UIDL command. For IMAP, this corresponds to the UID.

      Returns:
      the unique identifier string
